title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the correct intervals where one point is earned for the first interval and one point is earned for the second interval

1 < x < 3 and 6 < x < 7

1 point is earned for the correct justification

h is concave up when:

  • h′ is increasing, or

  • f is increasing, or

  • h″(x) > 0

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer

1 point is earned for the correct justification where one point is earned for eliminating interior points and one point is earned for eliminating 7

minimum at x = 1 because:

h increases on [1,5] and decreases on [5,7], so minimum is at an endpoint

h(7)=area  R 1 −area  R 2 >0 and h(1)=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5194@
